record.field: Petty Cash Settlement Apply e-mail template

Hello ${object.empl_id.parent_id.name},

The Petty Cash Settlement request has been applied by ${object.empl_id.name}(${object.empl_id.emp_code}) ,${object.empl_id.job_id.name}, ${object.empl_id.department_id.name} Department.

Petty Cash Settlement Details
Claim Ref: ${object.petty_cash_id.name}
Applied Date: ${format_tz(object.applied_date, tz='UTC', format='%d-%b-%Y')}
Claim Category: ${ctx['claim_category']}
Claim Type: ${ctx['claim_type']}
Total Expenses: ${object.currency_id.symbol}${'{:,.2f}'.format(object.expenses)}
Advance Taken: ${object.currency_id.symbol}${'{:,.2f}'.format(object.amount_total)}
Payable/Receivable: ${object.currency_id.symbol}${'{:,.2f}'.format(object.net_total)}

Please log into Tendrils to view Petty Settlement Request.

% if object.empl_id.user_id and object.empl_id.user_id.signature:
${object.empl_id.user_id.signature | safe} % endif
